name: USCorePatientDeceased
description:
**This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

text.div:
id us-core-patient-deceased

url : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter/us-core-patient-deceased

version : 4.0.1

name : USCorePatientDeceased

derivedFrom : http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Patient-deceased

status : active

date : 09/30/2022

publisher : HL7 International - Cross-Group Projects

contact : http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/cgp

jurisdiction : United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America (the)'})

code : deceased

base :Patient

type : token

expression : Patient.deceased.exists() and Patient.deceased != false

xpath : f:Patient/f:deceasedBoolean|f:Patient/f:deceasedDateTime

xpathUsage : normal

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)

mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)
